netapp_onboarding_description: Enterprise File Storage, powered by NetApp. Connect of all your OVHcloud solutions to a high-performance file storage service for your most critical business applications.
netapp_onboarding_recommendation_1: We recommend signing up to Premium support or higher.
netapp_onboarding_recommendation_2: For mission-critical applications that require 24/7 assistance, you need the right support.
netapp_onboarding_manager_start_title: Quick start via OVHcloud Control Panel
netapp_onboarding_manager_start_descript: Start storing your files with Enterprise File Storage via the OVHcloud Control Panel.
netapp_onboarding_api_start_description: Start storing your files with Enterprise File Storage via the OVHcloud API.
netapp_onboarding_volumes_description: In this guide, you will find out how to manage the volumes in your Enterprise File Storage solution.
netapp_onboarding_bullet_point_1: A high-performance, high-availability file storage service fully managed by OVHcloud, based on the NetApp ONTAP file system.
netapp_onboarding_bullet_point_2: Storage capacity from 1 TB to 58 TB per service and guaranteed performance provisioning per terabyte.
netapp_onboarding_bullet_point_2_emphasi: 64 MB/s and 4000 IOPS per TB of provisioned capacity.
netapp_onboarding_bullet_point_3: Available for different Linux workloads, virtualized environments via the NFS protocol.
netapp_onboarding_bullet_point_4: Provides a set of features: creation and management of your snapshots, management of ACLs, volume management...
